fields.name: Women's Black Sports Bra
fields.description: KISSLACE Women's Sports Bra Padded Full Support Wireless High Impact Racerback Yoga Workout Bra Fitness Wire Free Cups for Jogging Exercise

fields.name: Mens Black UA Vest
fields.description: The tailored cut fits close to the body to show off your bod while the signature Heatgear Sonic fabric keeps you cool and comfortable. An every day workout tank in colors that will stay stylish forever.

fields.name: Women's Nike White Dry Tank Top
fields.description: This gym top has a slim, flattering fit with a racerback design that lets you move freely. Made from smooth, sweat-wicking fabric that keeps you dry and finished with a large Swoosh graphic on the chest.

fields.name: Adidas Striped Jersey
fields.description: This men's football jersey is made with sweat-wicking fabric to keep you dry as you improve your skills. The adidas Badge of Sport shows your quality.

fields.name: UA Black Logo T-shirt
fields.description: Under Armour UA BOXED SPORTSTYLE Short Sleeve, Stylish and Comfortable T Shirt for Men, Breathable Gym and Fitness Clothing Men.

fields.name: Grey UA logo hoodie
fields.description: Under Armour French terry overhead training hoody with ColdGear technology. Keeps you warm and dry.

fields.name: Khaki UA Logo Hoodie
fields.description: Under Armour Rival Fleece Hoodie For Men, Perfectly Designed For Crossfit & Training.

fields.name: Red Nike half zip
fields.description: This half-zip top blocks out the cold air with ribbing at the lower sleeves, thumbholes and a low mock-neck. Finished in a coral red colourway for a stylish look.

fields.name: Black Mens Double Nike Swoosh Shorts
fields.description: Nike HBR Swoosh Shorts in Black. Crafted from soft French terry, these classic comfortable streetwise shorts feature a secure elasticated drawcord waist for a custom fit. Open hand pockets with a back snap pocket and embroidered double Swoosh.

fields.name: Complete Hex Dumbbells Set With Stand
fields.description: Designed and built with durability in mind, these HEX dumbbells are a fantastic and unique addition to add to your home gym set. They are an all-body conditioning tool â€“ to assist in building strength, size, and definition, as well as isolating your muscles.

fields.name: Olympic Barbell And Stand
fields.description: Suitable with two independent, 8 kg heavy and 50 x 51 cm (W x D) Large Standing feet is the Klarfit WS01 lifting table, supports, curl/approx Ideal for stable to store and the available space perfect to use.

fields.name: Olympic Weightlifting Plate Set
fields.description: Made from solid Virgin Rubber with 2 inch Galvanised Steel inners for durability, these long lasting, high quality plates are extensively tested and designed to take whatever you can throw at them, whilst their bright colours and bold writing make their weights easily identifiable and brightens up any gym or CrossFit Box!

fields.name: Rowing Machine
fields.description: Packed with features to provide detailed workout feedback and performance monitoring. It includes 25 profile programmes including target heart rate workouts, intervals, fitness tests and more. The LCD display gives various readouts and graphical displays, making sure the user has data on time, stroke rate, distance, heart rate, resistance levels and 500m/pace.

fields.name: Running Machine
fields.description: Like running on air burns up to 30% more calories than a motorized treadmill. Easy on the environment runs on your energy with zero electrical consumption

fields.name: Ski Erg
fields.description: Crossfit style machine, great for a cardio workout.

fields.name: Assault AirBike
fields.description: Crossfit styled machine, great for cardio as this machine works your arms at the same time as your legs are pedalling.
